original_text: But everyone who hears these words of mine and does not put them into practice is like a foolish man who built his house on sand.
korean_text: 나의 이 말을 듣고 행하지 아니하는 자는 그 집을 모래 위에 지은 어리석은 사람 같으리니

sentences.original_text: But everyone who hears these words of mine
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나의 이 말들을 듣는 모든 사람은

sentences.original_text: and does not put them into practice
who built his house on sand
